name: cloz-outfit-generation-api
description: Advanced outfit generation service with multiple AI models and realistic clothing constraints

scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ClozRandomLookGenerator --zip-file fileb://outfit-generator.zip --region eu-west-3
scripts.deploy:new: npm run package && aws lambda create-function --function-name ClozOutfitGenerator --runtime nodejs18.x --role arn:aws:iam::195275649388:role/ClozLambdaExecutionRole --handler src/handlers/outfit-generator.handler --zip-file fileb://outfit-generator.zip --region eu-west-3
scripts.invoke:test: aws lambda invoke --function-name ClozRandomLookGenerator --payload file://tests/sample-request.json response.json --region eu-west-3

author: Cloz Smart Closet
